text: This page lists singles released by American singer Michael Jackson. It is a partial list only. It includes singles released physically (those that could be bought at a record shop) and other singles released on radio. It does not include re-issues. The list shows how successful each single was on national record charts by listing the highest position each single reached on each chart. The national charts included are for the United States, Australia, Austria, Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, New Zealand, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland and the United Kingdom. Listed at the bottom are the record sales certifications for each single, which marks how many copies of each single were sold. The certifications are by RIAA, ARIA, Music Canada, IFPI Denmark, SNEP, BVMI, IFPI Norway, Recorded Music NZ, PROMUSICAE, IFPI Switzerland, and BPI. ==Singles== ===European peaks=== Year Single Peak chart positions AUT BEL DEN FIN FRA GER IRE ITA NED NOR SPA SWE SWI UK 1971 "Got To Be There" — — — — — — — — — — — — — 5 1972 "Rockin' Robin" — — — — — — 16 — — — — — — 3 "I Wanna Be Where You Are" — — — — — — — — — — — — — — "Ain't No Sunshine" — — — — — — — — 17 — — — 99 8 "Ben" — 7 — — 81 — 15 — 2 — — — — 7 1973 "With a Child's Heart" — — — — — — — — — — — — — — "Morning Glow" — — — — — — — — — — — — — — "Music And Me" — — — — — — — — 29 — — — — — "Happy" — — — — — — — — — — — — — 52 1975 "We're Almost There" — — — — — — — 9 — — — — — 46 "Just A Little Bit Of You" — — — — — — — — — — — — — — "One Day In Your Life" — 1 — — — — — — 2 — — — — 1 1979 "Don't Stop 'Til You Get Enough" 11 2 — — 52 13 10 6 2 1 2 18 4 3 "Rock With You" — — — — 59 58 11 9 22 — 1 — 68 7 "Off the Wall" — — — — — — 20 — 18 4 — 9 81 7 1980 "She's Out of My Life" — — — — — — 4 — 13 — — — 97 3 "Girlfriend" — — — — — — — — — — — — — 41 1982 "The Girl Is Mine" (with Paul McCartney) — 8 — — — 53 4 — 16 2 — — — 8 1983 "Billie Jean" 2 1 8 11 45 2 1 3 3 5 1 2 1 1 "Beat It" 6 1 16 12 47 2 2 12 1 8 1 19 2 3 "Wanna Be Startin' Somethin'" — 3 22 — — — 5 14 3 — — — 30 8 "Human Nature" — 12 39 — 165 64 — — 11 — — 38 46 — "P.Y.T.
